portfolio.title: Quick Deal
portfolio.description: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce web application using HTML, JS, CSS, and PHP. Key features include an intuitive product catalog, secure user authentication, and a responsive design for seamless shopping. Introduced a 'Buy in Bulk' option, enhancing user experience. The project, showcases my commitment to creating user-centric solutions. Explore my GitHub link to experience the innovative features.
